author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
In today's China, speaking the truth can get you labeled insane.
This video uncovers the terrifying reality of how the Chinese Communist Party uses psychiatric institutions as weapons of political repression. Whistleblowers, petitioners, dissidents, even innocent citizens—anyone who dares to question the regime—risk being kidnapped, drugged, tortured, and locked away in mental hospitals, all in the name of “treatment.”

Meet the victims. Hear their stories. Understand the system designed to destroy the sane.

🔴 This isn’t fiction. This is happening.
🔔 Subscribe and help expose what the CCP desperately wants to hide.
📢 Share this video. The world needs to know.

#LiYixue #CCP #HumanRights #MentalHospitalAbuse #ExposeTheCCP #FreeChina #PsychiatricTorture
title: You Criticize the Government? You're Mentally Ill Now
